meanings.definition: Not having a lot of money or wealth.
meanings.sent1: The nonaffluent family lived in a small apartment.
meanings.sent2: She preferred shopping at nonaffluent stores to save money.
meanings.sent3: The nonaffluent squirrel tried to save acorns but kept losing them.
meanings.sent4: The nonaffluent garden struggled to grow due to poor soil quality.
meanings.sent5: The nonaffluent neighborhood had a sense of community despite financial struggles.

meanings.sent1: The nonaffluent student worked part-time to pay for school.
meanings.sent2: They organized a fundraiser to help the nonaffluent community members.
meanings.sent3: The nonaffluent piggy bank was always empty, much to the child's dismay.
meanings.sent4: Her nonaffluent wardrobe consisted of hand-me-downs and thrift store finds.
meanings.sent5: The nonaffluent town faced challenges in providing basic services to its residents.
